job_description.title: Junior Frontend Developer
job_description.description:
We're seeking a Junior Frontend Developer to join our growing web team. You'll work on client projects ranging from marketing websites to web applications, learning from experienced developers and gradually taking on more responsibility.

This is a great opportunity for someone early in their career (0-2 years experience) or a recent bootcamp graduate with a strong portfolio. We value enthusiasm, willingness to learn, and solid fundamentals over extensive experience.

other_requirements: Basic understanding of React components and state
Eagerness to learn and take feedback

responsibilities: Build responsive websites and web applications under supervision
Write clean, maintainable code following team standards
Gradually take ownership of smaller features

evaluation_context.notes: More balanced weights for junior role. Lower Qualification (15%) because we're willing to train. Higher Career Trajectory (15%) and Reward (15%) to identify candidates with growth potential. Situational Stability important (15%) because we invest in training and want someone who'll stay 2+ years.
